docs.text: 👋 Welcome to smart-settings Inspired by Django ,smart-settings is a python package that helps you deal with your project settings in a more Pythonic way. Why smart-settings help decouples settings' location from your code ability to add default settings ability to add modify settings at run time thread-safe implementation ability to add save settings modified at run time JSON/YAML support Duplicate check Run Example with python app.py --setting=config.settings Project Structure Example project │ │ │ └───config │ __init__.py │ settings.py │ │ └───smart_settings | __init__.py | core.py | │ └───app.py
docs.title: Home
